turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a caffe latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, can I get almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Where can I pick it up in Tampa, Florida? Tampa, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me find stores in your area.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you near hillsborough avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, Hillsboro Avenue would work.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i can send your order to that location, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall caffe latte with almond milk to be picked up at 502 east hillsborough avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent. Okay, I will go pick it up. No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
